title: There will be optional practice in every chapter of all subjects.
details: The online batch library offers the opportunity to practice chapter-wise questions for all subjects.

title: No matter how many questions there are, all the solutions are in class!
details: There will be 2 teachers in the live class! One will teach, the other will answer students' questions in the chat.

title: Parents are now tension free!
details: What is he studying in the batch? How is he doing? You can know all the updates by looking at the subject-wise progress report, sitting at home.
